titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to simplify the assessment and collection of the excise tax on arrows.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9041-9042)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/14/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code by including in the excise tax on bows and arrows any shaft, point, nock, or vane used in the manufacture of an arrow.
